user.title: Lovense Standard API Setup
user.description:
⚠️ SECURITY: Never expose Home Assistant directly to the internet! Use secure callback URLs only (Cloudflare Tunnel, Nabu Casa, Tailscale).

Configure your Lovense API connection:

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Lovense API
error.callback_url_not_https: Callback URL must use HTTPS for security
error.callback_url_localhost: Never use localhost or 127.0.0.1 - this exposes your system to the internet!
error.callback_url_unsafe: Unsafe callback URL detected. Use Cloudflare Tunnel, Nabu Casa, or Tailscale instead of direct port forwarding.
